dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Alright, so, have you seen this news about Mikhail Lomtadze?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alright, so, have you seen this news about Mikhail Lomtadze?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah! The Peoples Gratitude Medal, right? Pretty big deal.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah! The Peoples Gratitude Medal, right? Pretty big deal.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Mikhail Lomtadze On June 23, as part of the 'Biz Birgemiz' online forum, a ceremony was held to award the Peoples Gratitude Medal, on behalf of the President of Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally! It was given on behalf of the President, Kassym-Jomart Tokayev, actually. At this online forum, 'Biz Birgemiz.'
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally! It was given on behalf of the President, Kassym-Jomart Tokayev, actually. At this online forum, Biz Birgemiz.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Mikhail Lomtadze On June 23, as part of the 'Biz Birgemiz' online forum, a ceremony was held to award the Peoples Gratitude Medal, on behalf of the President of Kazakhstan. Solidarity, resilience and empathy are the traditional values of our people, said President Kassym-Zhomart Tokayev at the opening of the forum.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Uh-huh, and Tokayev was really emphasizing, like, traditional values – solidarity, resilience, empathy, you know? How those helped them get through tough times.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh-huh, and Tokayev was really emphasizing, like, traditional values - solidarity, resilience, empathy, you know? How those helped them get through tough times.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Solidarity, resilience and empathy are the traditional values of our people, said President Kassym-Zhomart Tokayev at the opening of the forum. It is these qualities that have helped us overcome the most difficult times in our history.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and he said, "Biz Birgemiz" is their new motto. But what really stood out to me was Lomtadze’s comments about Kaspi.kz’s role.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and he said, Biz Birgemiz is their new motto. But what really stood out to me was Lomtadze's comments about Kaspi.kz's role.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We are together ('Biz Birgemiz') is the new motto of our society.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, he really dedicated the award to, um, all the Kaspi.kz employees and partners who worked, like, day and night.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, he really dedicated the award to, um, all the Kaspi.kz employees and partners who worked, like, day and night.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This award is testament to every Kaspi.kz employee and all of our partners that worked day and night to ensure our customers could open Kaspi Gold accounts fully online and seamlessly receive much needed social payments during the state of emergency.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: To make sure people could open Kaspi Gold accounts online, and, like, seamlessly get their social payments during the state of emergency. That's a huge thing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: To make sure people could open Kaspi Gold accounts online, and, like, seamlessly get their social payments during the state of emergency. That's a huge thing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This award is testament to every Kaspi.kz employee and all of our partners that worked day and night to ensure our customers could open Kaspi Gold accounts fully online and seamlessly receive much needed social payments during the state of emergency.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It really is! I mean, they collaborated with the National Bank and the Ministry of Labor –
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really is! I mean, they collaborated with the National Bank and the Ministry of Labor -
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We would like to thanks our colleagues from the National Bank, the Ministry of Labor and Social Protection and Government for Citizens for their support.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and Government for Citizens too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We would like to thanks our colleagues from the National Bank, the Ministry of Labor and Social Protection and Government for Citizens for their support.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! And the numbers are wild: 4.4 million people got payments through them online, out of seven million total. That's, uh, significant.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! And the numbers are wild: four point four million people got payments through them online, out of seven million total. That's, uh, significant.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As a result, 4.4 million people received their payments online through the Kaspi.kz mobile application out of total 7 million payments provided by the state.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Super significant. And it wasn't just payments, right? They also organized, like, delivery service from their Marketplace.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Super significant. And it wasn't just payments, right? They also organized, like, delivery service from their Marketplace.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Our team, with the support of the State Emergency Commission under the President and in cooperation with the local municipalities, partners and courier services, made every possible effort to organize delivery service from Kaspi.kz Marketplace Platform

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah! So over 500,000 families could shop safely without leaving home. That's, like, a lifesaver during a lockdown.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah! So over five hundred thousand families could shop safely without leaving home. That's, like, a lifesaver during a lockdown.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Our team...made every possible effort to organize delivery service from Kaspi.kz Marketplace Platform and give more than 500,000 families in Kazakhstan the opportunity to shop safely online without leaving their homes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. And, um, speaking of contributions, Lomtadze and Vyacheslav Kim, the co-founders, they also bought and donated 100,000 COVID-19 tests.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. And, um, speaking of contributions, Lomtadze and Vyacheslav Kim, the co-founders, they also bought and donated one hundred thousand degrees c O V I D-nineteen tests.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Mikhail Lomtadze and Vyacheslav Kim, co-founders of Kaspi.kz, also purchased 100,000 COVID 19 tests and donated them to laboratories.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow, that’s, like, incredible. It just goes to show what kind of widespread effort this medal is recognizing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, that's, like, incredible. It just goes to show what kind of widespread effort this medal is recognizing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it wasn't just him, right? It went to doctors, police, military, cultural figures, volunteers...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it wasn't just him, right? It went to doctors, police, military, cultural figures, volunteers...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The 'Peoples Gratitude' medal was awarded to those, who made a significant contribution to the life of the country during this difficult period, including doctors, policemen, military personnel, cultural figures, media representatives, volunteers and philanthropists.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Everyone who really stepped up during that difficult period. It's a nice way to, you know, acknowledge that collective gratitude.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Everyone who really stepped up during that difficult period. It's a nice way to, you know, acknowledge that collective gratitude.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. A real testament to the 'Biz Birgemiz' spirit, I guess.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. A real testament to the Biz Birgemiz spirit, I guess.
